title: Sylvia Jeffrey flaunts her baby bump while out in Sydney
text:
She announced that she's expecting her first child with husband Peter Stefanovic last month.

And on Thursday, Sylvia Jeffreys was simply glowing as she flaunted her burgeoning baby bump while enjoying a sunny day out in Sydney.

The 33-year-old mother-to-be looked stylish in a beige coloured pleated flowing top with loose sleeves and black jeans.

Bumping along nicely! Sylvia Jeffreys was simply glowing as she showed off her burgeoning baby bump while enjoying a day out in Sydney non Thursday

Style: Sylvia looked stylish in a beige coloured pleated flowing top with loose sleeves and black jeans

She accessorised her ensemble with a comfortable pair of sneakers and sunglasses to shield herself from the sun.

Sylvia styled her golden tresses in a low ponytail and wore a neutral palette of make-up consisting of rosy cheeks and a nude lip.

Her outing comes one month after she announced that she's expecting her first child with her husband via Instagram.

Casual: Sylvia styled her golden tresses in a ponytail and wore a pair of sunglasses to shield herself from the sun

Radiant: The mother-to-be wore a neutral palette of make-up consisting of rosy cheeks and a nude lip

Comfort: Sylvia swapped her regular stilettos for a pair of comfortable white sneakers for the outing

'We're having a baby boy and we're totally over the moon!' she wrote.

Peter also took to Instagram, sharing a photo of himself and Sylvia as he held a card that read, 'It's a boy!'

'Soon to be a family of three and we are rapt! Good thing I'm already match fit with the whole no sleep thing,' he added.

Exciting! Last month, Sylvia announced that she's expecting her first child with her husband, Peter Stefanovic, via Instagram

'Soon to be a family of three!' Peter also shared a photo of himself and Sylvia as he held a card that read, 'It's a boy!'

Peter proposed back in July 2016 while the couple were enjoying a romantic trip to France.

The couple wed in a very lavish ceremony at the exclusive Ooralba Estate in the Kangaroo Valley in April 2017.

They married before 160 guests including Channel Nine stars Richard Wilkins, Lisa Wilkinson and Peter's brother Karl Stefanovic.

Love is in the air! Peter proposed back in July 2016 while the couple were enjoying a romantic trip to France
description: She announced that she's expecting her first child with husband Peter Stefanovic last month.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
